name: Space Jumper
description:
THE CHASE IS ON! Try to stay alive as long as possible in this amazing #1 thrilling and action packed jumping adventure. Meet the brave astronaut, he needs your help!

Game Features:
- Simple one touch controls.
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master.
- Retro 8 Bit graphics and sounds :-)
- Google+ Leaderboard, compare your best score with your friends.
- Achievements

How to Play:
- Tap on the left side of the screen to perform a low jump and tap on the right side for a high jump.
- Try to get some coins, because coins are extra bonus points!

Youtube Demo:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8PeGSU1HQig

Install via the Play Store via the next link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
